ygData.subject: Re: Psalm of Warmth
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I believe my druid/ranger friends were using Coats, and when I played PoW I was only seeing the pierced by thorns message, no burned message when
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 22 Jul 1999, Keith G. Spencer wrote:
>
> The 3 different types of dmg shields are the Coat Series (Druid/Ranger
> Self Only), Shield Series (Druid/Ranger Targetable), and Heat/Frost Series
> (O'keil's Radiation, etc)
>
> Psalm of Warmth & Cooling fall into the 3rd set and wont stack with others
> of that type. The three types are meant to stack though, and if it's not
> working currently it is a bug. I do know Warmth stacks fine with SoT
> though, as last night I was getting 13's of the hits (9 from SoT, 4 from
> PoW).

Hmm, I believe my druid/ranger friends were using Coats, and
when I played PoW I was only seeing the "pierced by thorns"
message, no "burned" message when the mob attacked them.
I'll have to ask them next time it happens.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
